name: Zombie Slide Puzzle For Kids
description:
Welcome to Zombie Slide Puzzle Kids Game.

This Zombie Slide Puzzle Kids Game is a learning game for kids and it is also a kid’s puzzle game its goal being an improvement of kid’s concentration, cognitive capability, and sense of space.

Provide an enjoyable time to your kids through Zombie Slide Puzzle Kids Game

Our game has the following Features :
- 20 Zombie’s Puzzles Enjoyable.

- High-Quality puzzle images

- Beautiful background music which goes well with the images

- Simple and eidetic interface which is easy for kids to control

-You can Also Music On/Off.

- Various sizes of puzzles from 3x3,4*4,5*5,6*6 and 7*7.

- Major users are from age 4 to 10, from child not yet attending school to lower graders of elementary school

How to play :
- Select the sizes and kinds of puzzles.
- The game begins when the play button on the screen is clicked.

Also You Can Quick sharing: when finished just share your Best Time Score Screen Photo with friends by email and on social networks and you challenge them.
